name: Anagram & Word Lookup for Words with Friends
name_original: Anagram & Word Lookup for Words with Friends
description:
With this helper utility for Words with Friends, Scrabble, Wordfeud and other word games you can quickly find all possible valid words for the letters/blanks on your rack. You can also quickly find out whether your words are valid and look up their definitions. Improve your skill by using it as a training tool.

Features:
- Quick anagram solver
- Check if a word is valid
- Definition lookup
- Thesaurus lookup
- Encyclopedia lookup
- Switch between up to 10 racks/games
- Supports Words with friends, Scrabble, and Wordfeud
- Various tips, hints, and strategy
- Lists of useful memory words for training
- Allows use of wildcards (for blank tiles)
- Special filter to narrow down the search results
- Sort your search results three ways: alphabetic, by length, by score
- Portrait and landscape mode support


Definitions, thesaurus and encyclopedia require internet access.

All trademarks are property of their respective owners.
